mapper.select: SELECT a.object_id as "id", SUM(bcp.complete_num) as "sumCompleteNum", ( select SUM(bcp.complete_num) FROM biz_scheduling_plan bsp left join biz_complete_paln bcp on bcp.scheduling_id = bsp.id and bcp.status=1 and bcp.complete_status=1 WHERE bsp.status = 1 AND bsp.object_id =#{objectId} and bsp.object_name='biz_request_detail' ) as "sumCompleteDetailNum" FROM biz_scheduling_plan a left join biz_complete_paln bcp on bcp.scheduling_id = a.id and bcp.status=1 WHERE a.status = 1 AND a.object_id =#{objectId}

SELECT a.id AS "id", rh.req_no AS "requestHeader.reqNo", bsi.name AS "skuInfo.name", bpi.vendor_id AS "vendorId", bpi.vendor_name AS "vendorName", bsi.item_no AS "skuInfo.itemNo", bii.id AS "inventorySku.invInfo.id", bii.name AS "inventorySku.invInfo.name", bis.inv_type AS "inventorySku.invType", bis.sku_type AS "inventorySku.skuType", bis.id AS "inventorySku.id", bis.u_version AS "inventorySku.uVersion", a.recv_qty AS "recvQty", a.out_qty AS "outQty", bis.stock_qty AS "inventorySku.stockQty" FROM biz_request_detail a LEFT JOIN biz_request_header rh ON rh.id = a.header_id LEFT JOIN biz_sku_info bsi ON bsi.id = a.sku_id LEFT JOIN biz_product_info bpi ON bpi.id = bsi.prod_id LEFT JOIN biz_inventory_sku bis ON bis.sku_id = bsi.id LEFT JOIN biz_inventory_info bii ON bii.id = bis.inv_id WHERE a.status = 1 AND rh.status = 1 AND rh.biz_status != 40 AND bis.status = 1 AND bii.cust_id = #{centerId} AND bsi.id = #{skuId} ORDER BY a.create_time ASC

SELECT a.id, rh.req_no AS "requestHeader.reqNo", bsi.name AS "skuInfo.name", bpi.vendor_id AS "vendorId", bpi.vendor_name AS "vendorName", bsi.item_no AS "skuInfo.itemNo", bii.id AS "inventorySku.invInfo.id", bii.name AS "inventorySku.invInfo.name", bis.inv_type AS "inventorySku.invType", bis.sku_type AS "inventorySku.skuType", bis.id AS "inventorySku.id", bis.u_version AS "uVersion", a.recv_qty AS "recvQty", a.out_qty AS "outQty", bis.stock_qty AS "inventorySku.stockQty" FROM biz_request_detail a LEFT JOIN biz_request_header rh ON rh.id = a.header_id LEFT JOIN biz_sku_info bsi ON bsi.id = a.sku_id LEFT JOIN biz_product_info bpi ON bpi.id = bsi.prod_id LEFT JOIN biz_inventory_order_request bior ON bior.request_detail_id = a.id LEFT JOIN biz_inventory_sku bis ON bis.id = bior.inv_sku_id LEFT JOIN biz_inventory_info bii ON bii.id = bis.inv_id LEFT JOIN biz_order_detail od ON od.id = bior.order_detail_id WHERE a.status = 1 AND od.status = 1 AND bis.status = 1 AND rh.biz_status != 40 AND od.id = #{orderDetailId}

SELECT SUM(a.recv_qty) AS recvTotal FROM biz_request_detail a LEFT JOIN biz_request_header rh ON rh.id = a.header_id WHERE a.status = 1 AND rh.status = 1 AND rh.from_id = #{centId} AND a.sku_id = #{skuId}

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.recv_qty AS "recvQty", a.out_qty AS "outQty" FROM biz_request_detail a LEFT JOIN biz_request_header rh ON rh.id = a.header_id WHERE a.sku_id =#{skuId} AND rh.from_id = #{centId}
